delhi.question: According to the article, what is the term used to refer to the newly appointed workers against open defecation?

options: they will escort the offenders to the nearest police station
they will collect a fine of Rs.1,000 from offenders
they will publicly name and shame the offenders
they will blow a whistle and direct them to the nearest public toilet
delhi.correct: they will blow a whistle and direct them to the nearest public toilet
